Reference

All functions

calc_esat()

Calculates saturation vapour pressure

fdk_balance_energy()

Energy balance closure

fdk_convert_lsm()

Converts LSM NetCDF data to FLUXNET

fdk_correct_era()

Corrects ERA data

fdk_correct_rs()

Rename remote sensing variables

fdk_data_coverge()

Calculates data coverage

fdk_detect_outliers()

Detect outliers in a time series

fdk_download_cloud_cover()

Download ERA5 cloud cover data

fdk_download_modis()

Download MODIS LAI/FPAR

fdk_downsample_fluxnet()

Down samples half-hourly FLUXNET data to daily values

fdk_era5_request()

Download request for drivers from ECMWF

fdk_flux_corrections()

Flux corrections routine

fdk_format_drivers()

Format p-model drivers

fdk_get_sequence()

Get sequence of good-quality data

fdk_match_modis()

match MODIS LAI/FPAR to ERA data

fdk_optimal_span()

Calculates the optimal span for a loess spline

fdk_plot()

Plot FluxDataKit output

fdk_process_cloud_cover()

Process ERA5 cloud cover data

fdk_process_lsm()

Generate LSM data

fdk_release()

Creates a new FluxDataKit product release

fdk_setup_sofun()

Complements the setup settings

fdk_site_info

FDK site info file

fdk_smooth_ts()

Smooth MODIS time series

fill_netrad()

Gap fill net radiation measurements

site_exceptions()

Address ad-hoc data exceptions in conversions (lifted from FluxnetLSM)
